item.title: About
item.description: Summary If I had to describe my self in one sentance: Software developer with a love for making things. Development Setup You can check out my config files here OS: Linux Text editor: Vim Web searching: w3m Containers: Podman Other: Tmux Programming languages Python Javascript Typescript Bash Java Technologies Web development: Django Fast API Express Remix Databases: Postgress MongoDB SQlite ORM Tools (Object-Relational Mapper): SQLAlchemy Prisma Caching: Redis Networking: Nginx Python request module Testing:
